entry.title: Bitcoin Core 26.1 released
entry.summary: The recent release of Core v27.0 has prompted the immediate availability of Libre Relay v27.0, which can be found at [GitHub](https://github.com/petertodd/bitcoin/tree/libre-relay-v27.0) and further details are accessible through [Peter Todd's official website](https://petertodd.org). This update means that users and developers interested in exploring or integrating the latest version can directly reach out to Peter Todd via email, ensuring a direct line of communication for support or queries regarding the new release. The links provided not only direct to the source code but also offer a gateway to a broader array of resources and documentation available on Peter Todd's website, facilitating a deeper understanding of the updates and features introduced in Libre Relay v27.0.
